input_args.passage: "John Wick (character) - Wikipedia | He is the titular protagonist of the American media franchise John Wick. In the franchise's film series, he is introduced as a legendary Belarusian-American ex-hitman who left the criminal underworld after falling in love with and marrying a woman named Helen., titular protagonist of the American media franchise John Wick\nJohn Wick - Wikipedia | John Wick is an American neo-noir action thriller media franchise created by Derek Kolstad and centered on John Wick, a former hitman who is drawn back into the criminal underworld he had previously abandoned., neo-noir action thriller"
input_args.claim: 'However, from sources and, we learn that John Wick is a part of an American media franchise and is characterized as a neo-noir action thriller.'
